title: Oak's Parcel
description: Oak's Parcel is a one shot created by JOEtheDM as an introduction to Pokémon5E.

title: Kanto: Indigo League
description: jslabes#8547 on Discord have created this complete Pokemon 5E adventure, it also includes rules for traveling, scenarios for encountering wild Pokémon and shiney Pokémon and much more.

title: Daycares and Eggs
description: TheBirdBlue created this supplement for Breeding and using Daycares. The breeding is based on egg groups.

title: Pokémon Breeding
description: jslabes#8547 on Discord created this supplement for hatching eggs and breeding Pokemon. The breeding is based on natures.

title: Alolan Forms
description: foiledfeline#2237 on Discord created this supplement for adding Alolan forms.

title: Mega Evolutions
description: foiledfeline#2237 on Discord created this supplement for using Mega Evolutions.

title: Pokémon Contests
description: Nomi#0980 on Discord created this supplement for running Pokémon Contests.

title: More Battle Types
description: Flarithen#4425 on Discord created this supplement containing a bunch of alternative battle types

title: Pokémon Races
description: Amazon#0202 on Discord created this supplement for adding 'native' Players Races such as Kantoan and Sinnoan.

title: D&D Races
description: milomedic#4836 on Discord created this supplement that adapts the D&D 5e races to work more naturally with the Pokémon world.

title: P5E Backgrounds
description: 0silverphoenix#6596 on Discord have created a supplement for some backgrounds that fit better in Pokémon5E.

title: Stadium Cup Rules
description: Flarithen#4425 on Discord created this supplement of Pokemon Cup Rules.

title: Joe's Baby Birds
description: JOEtheDM created this supplement for including pre-evolution to the Legendary Birds of Kanto.

title: OoRJ's Baby Birds
description: OoRJ#1534 created these alternative pre-evolution to the Legendary Birds of Kanto.

title: Johto Travel Times
description: Flarithen#4425 on Discord created this supplement of pre-estimated travel times in Johto.

title: Trainer/Pokémon Sheet
description: A google sheet created by JOEtheDM to help players keep track of their caught Pokémon.

title: DM Pokémon Builder
description: A google sheet created by JOEtheDM to help DMs be organised.

title: Random Pokémon
description: A google sheet created by JOEtheDM to randomize a Pokémon depending on Terrain.

title: Combat Master for 5E
description: A google sheet created by [/u/HappyMyconid](https://www.reddit.com/user/HappyMyconid/) it contains a few different tools created to make Dungeon Mastering easier.

title: Pokédex Sheet
description: A google sheet created by [/u/T_HINE](https://www.reddit.com/user/T_HINE) to let you keep track of caught and seen Pokémon for Gen 1 to 4.

title: Fillable Player PDF
description: Made by OoRJ#1534 on Discord.

title: Fillable Inventory PDF
description: Made by OoRJ#1534 on Discord.

title: Fillable Pokemon PDF
description: Made by OoRJ#1534 on Discord, there is also one [with 5 moves](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_WlKmm0uyoHqWxEAx1cnQODDB2jPqDC1/view?usp=drivesdk).

title: Simplified Sheets
description: Meme Man#3221 on Discord created this simplified character sheet, it also exists in [black/white](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MknsIKKDBUA6g_rZBBmfDoWYb6qf7C7T/view).

title: Macros
description: Ripple_Effect_MLP#2666 on Discord have created a whole document for Roll20 macros of Moves and such.

title: Characters for 5e Comp.
description: [At'd]#2379 on Discord have created characters classes for the [5e Companion App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blastervla.ddencountergenerator)

title: Pokémon Tokens I & II
description: Tortoxicion#6640 on Discord have created tokens made to be to scale when printed.

title: Lindseyrie's Collection
description: Lindseyrie#8403 on Discord have their own collection of supplements, it also includes a lot of other rules.

title: P5E DM Screen
description: Blythe#0001 on Discord have a document containing of tables and other nice info you can print and stick to youPr DM screen.
